org.opensha2.calc

Class Site

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opensha2.calc.Site
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Named

    public class Site
extends Object
implements Named
    Site characteristics container. Take note of default values. Not all GroundMotionModels will use all fields and additional fields may be added at any time in the future.
    Author:
    Peter Powers

      A reusable Site builder.

      • name

        public final String name
        The site name.

      • location

        public final Location location
        The location.

        Default: lat=34.05, lon=-118.25 (Los Angeles, CA)

      • vs30

        public final double vs30
        The average shear-wave velocity down to 30 meters depth.

        Default: 760.0 m/sec

      • vsInferred

        public final boolean vsInferred
        Whether Vs30 was inferred, true, or measured, false.

        Default: true (inferred)

      • z1p0

        public final double z1p0
        Depth to the shear-wave velocity horizon of 1.0 km/sec, in km.

        Default: NaN (GroundMotionModels will use a default value or model)

      • z2p5

        public final double z2p5
        Depth to the shear-wave velocity horizon of 2.5 km/sec, in km;

        Default: NaN (GroundMotionModels will use a default value or model)
